headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: eBay Soars as Meta Permits Facebook Marketplace Listings
summary: The S&P 500 added 0.2% on Wednesday, Jan. 8, 2025, as minutes from the most recent Fed policy meeting hinted at a gradual path for rate cuts.

headline: Edison International stock falls 10% amid California wildfires
summary: Wildfires continue to blaze across Los Angeles, leaving nearly 400,000 residents without electricity and forcing over 70,000 to leave the area under a mandatory evacuation order. Market Domination host Julie Hyman monitors the negative stock moves in Edison International (EIX), a major utility provider in southern California. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here. This post was written by Angel Smith

headline: Edison International stock plummets as wildfires leave 70,000 Southern Californians without power
summary: Edison International stock fell 13% Wednesday after the company shut off power to tens of thousands of customers in Southern California as wildfires blazed through the region.

headline: Edison International Stock Sinks as Los Angeles Wildfires Cause Power Shutoffs
summary: Shares of Edison International plummeted Wednesday as its Southern California Edison subsidiary was forced to shut off power to thousands of customers because of the Los Angeles-area wildfires.

raw.headline: Edison International Stock Sinks as Los Angeles Wildfires Cause Power Shutoffs

headline: Southern California Edison Bonds Widen Amid Wildfires in LA Area
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Bonds tied to Edison International, the parent of the largest utility in Southern California, weakened on Wednesday after windstorms fanned wildfires into even bigger conflagrations in the Los Angeles area. headline: AMD (AMD), Edison International (EIX) Are Among Today’s Big Losers
summary: Chip maker AMD (AMD) and California electric utility Edison International (EIX) are two of today’s losers. AMD is retreating nearly 5% while Edison is giving back 8%. headline: Raging Los Angeles Fires Kill 2, Injure Scores as Homes Burn
